title: My Fiancee Is a Stunning CEO - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
author: Hua You Shan Yue   花幽山月
description:
A mysterious expert stepped into the city. He signed a marriage contract with a beautiful and cold female CEO but was disliked by her. So poor. So he had to go out to hunt beauties. 

Unexpectedly, one beauty after another came, causing Shen Lang to fall into all kinds of romantic whirlpools. 

Of course, the most important thing was still to conquer the cold CEO. She was not obedient? Tame her.>
